attributes.action: use all and any military means to degrade Iran's nuclear weapons programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of Iran's illegal aggression towards UK servicepersons, the repeatedly stated intent of Iran's president to wipe our ally Israel off the map, and its sponsorship of Islamic terrorist groups in Iraq, Lebanon and Palestine, Iran's nuclear weapons programme must be inhibited and degraded by the use of military means including, if necessary, nuclear weapons.  Appeasement and vacillation didn't stop Hitler, nor will it stop Ahmadinejad.
